item.title: SWEC Audio Mixer Upgrade
item.description: Item Type Price Link [PreSonus StudioLive 24R Series III]() Stage Box/Console AU$1279.20 Product 8x TRS (m) to XLR (m) Cable $AU$19.92 eBay 4x TRS (m) to 2x TS (m) Cable AU$16.56 eBay ARTcessories P16 XLR Patch Bay AU$149 Product [PreSonus StudioLive 16 Series III]() Console AU$2399.20 Product 2x Neutrik NE8MC Cable Connector AU$11.

item.title: Neutrik EtherCON Kits
item.description: The PreSonus StudioLive 16 and StudioLive 24R have an EtherCON port for their AVB connection. You could forego the EtherCON connector and just connect an Ethernet cable, but I’ve had one occassion where a network stagebox got disconnected because the cable got kicked off. Neutrik sells several EtherCON kits, the two I bought were Neutrik NE8MC and the Neutrik NE8MC-1. (Didn’t need the CAT6 series, which would’ve been the NE8MX6 series)

item.title: Behringer X-Touch Mini
item.description: Got my hands on a Behringer X-Touch Mini USB MIDI Controller (Yay for Facebook Marketplace). Will be using this in my Lightroom editing workflow! Configuration Changing the MIDI Mapping The X-Touch Mini has 12 white buttons. With two layers, that would give us 24 different buttons. However some of the buttons were mapped to the same MIDI control key aka - some buttons are duplicate. So firstly, we’ll need to remap the surface.

item.title: RICE Rally 2018 Sydney
item.description: In a world full of noise, how do we find what we’re really looking for? RICE Movement is a Christian organisation that brings the message of Jesus to high schoolers (of Australia, and now New Zealand too!) RICE Rally is their annual event, a big evangelical ‘rally’. I got the opportunity to serve with my brother in the Production team (that is, lyrics and projection). Our playground was three LED walls and two confidence monitors.

item.title: NewTek NDI
item.description: NewTek NDI is a really amazing actually suite of software designed to transport audio and video data over networks. Note: I recommend a gigabit connection between the producers and consumersss, as it easily saturates 100 MB/s with all settings max’d. I’ve been using it a while: Screen recording Laptop screen streaming - Scan Converter on the laptop, Virtual Input on the desktop RICE Rally 2018 - Use OBS to create composites from several NDI sources Software Scan Converter Share your computer screen, or a region of the screen
